metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6197 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The r_read_* functions in libr/include/r_endian.h in radare2 1.2.1 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by the r_read_le32 function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-4.2.1 - 1.1.0+dfsg-3
libradare2-common - 1.1.0+dfsg-3
radare2 - 1.1.0+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.0+dfsg-3').
